title: Janitor Cart - Gray
features: Handle folds up for easier storage and handling
description: Janitor Cart - Gray: This Industrial Grade janitorial cleaning cart includes all the hooks, holders and shelving area to carry your cleaning equipment. It includes a 25 gallon vinyl bag that securely mounts to the back of the frame and is easy to change. The front extended shelf is large enough to house a Heavy Duty Mop Bucket, Recharging Bucket for Microfiber Mop Pads or whatever your cleaning application may require. The 3 shelf construction allows plenty of space for smaller yet necessary cleaning tools Microfiber Cloths, Sponges, Chemicals, Wet Mops etc. It includes hooks to hold handles and brooms into place keeping them close and secured to the cart. The front hook is perfect size to fit an easy to access wet floor sign. These durable Janitor Carts are perfect for all of your janitorial needs Hospitals, Schools, Offices, Hotels, anywhere you need to seamlessly move your cleaning supplies room to room.
